```{r}
rescola <- function(v_start, v_max, alpha, num_trials)
{
  v_vec = c(v_start)
  delta_v_vec = c(0)
  
  for(i in 2:num_trials)
  {
    delta_v_vec[i] = alpha*(v_max - v_vec[i-1])
    v_vec[i] = v_vec[i-1] + delta_v_vec[i]
  }
  
  data<-as.data.frame(cbind(v_vec, delta_v_vec))
  colnames(data)<-c("v","delta_v")
  return(data)
}

num_trials = 20
data = rescola(0, 1, 0.15, num_trials)
plot(seq(from=1, to=num_trials), data$v)
lines(seq(from=1, to=num_trials), data$v,col="black",lwd=2)
```
